titleStmt.title: The history of love a poem in a letter to a lady / by Mr. Charles Hopkins.
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, Charles, 1664?-1700?
Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D. Metamorphoses. English. Selections. 1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Dawks, for Jacob Tonson ...,

notesStmt.note: "Several stories of Ovid's Metamorphoses translated into English verse": p. [85]-118.
Includes several poems in imitation of Ovid's "Metamorphoses."
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
